name: Dungeonathlon
description:
Backstory:

You are a knight and every year you all gather together to race through a dungeon and the one who is victorious is granted the sword of games.  While some may say the challenge is inhumane, knights still participate for a chance at the legendary sword.

Controls:
WASD or Arrow Keys to Move and Jump.  You can hold the jump button to get extra height on your jump.

Post Mortem:
Honestly with this one I just wanted to do some short and to the point,  I could've have taken another day to do some more work on it but I have other projects that I would like to make more progress on.

I do wish I could have made it a lot longer... with checkpoints and such.

I tried making some music and I think it turned out alright for a track made in only a few minutes.

Source Code:
https://github.com/scolondev/OlympicGames
